name: Razer Barracuda X Chroma
info: RAZER™ TRIFORCE 40 MM DRIVERS ,DETACHABLE RAZER™ HYPERCLEAR CARDIOID MIC,70-HOUR BATTERY LIFE Multi-Day Use

featureSections.title: HYBRID AUDIO FREEDOM.ILLUMINATED.
featureSections.description: Whether you’re at home or on the go, experience true audio versatility and flair anywhere with the Razer Barracuda X Chroma. Featuring Razer SmartSwitch Dual Wireless, toggle between gaming and mobile use instantly with a lightweight wireless RGB gaming headset that offers the best of both worlds.

featureSections.title: PERSONALIZE CHROMA EFFECTS
featureSections.description: Via Razer Audio App & Razer Synapse

featureSections.title: RAZER™ SMARTSWITCH DUAL WIRELESS
featureSections.description: Capable of connecting to a 2.4GHz and Bluetooth device at once, SmartSwitch enables seamless shifting between both for unrivalled convenience., Quick-Toggle Between Razer™ HyperSpeed & Bluetooth.

featureSections.title: 6-ZONE EARCUP LIGHTING
featureSections.description: Enjoy new, stunning RGB lighting effects on a wireless gaming headset featuring 6-zone earcup lighting. With access to 16.8 million colors and a suite of lighting effects, apply your preferred settings and watch it work seamlessly with over 300 games and 500 devices across more than 50 partners.

Microphone.value: Upgraded Detachable Razer™ HyperClear Cardioid Mic

Build & Connectivity.value: Wireless: Razer™ HyperSpeed Wireless Technology (2.4 GHz) + Bluetooth 5.3

name: Razer Basilisk V3 Pro 35K
info: Set your immersion to maximum with the Razer Basilisk V3 Pro 35K—a wireless ergonomic RGB gaming mouse that’s more advanced and customizable than ever. Featuring our most precise sensor and scroll wheel with deeper configuration options, playing your way just took on a whole new meaning.

featureSections.title: TACTILE CYCLING MODE
featureSections.description: For high-precision and distinct notched scrolling ideal for cycling through weapons or skills.

featureSections.title: VIRTUAL ACCELERATION
featureSections.description: By turning on this Razer Synapse 4 feature, you’ll be able to increase the mouse’s scroll speed the faster you scroll, allowing you to navigate through lengthy documents and articles at an even quicker rate.

featureSections.title: FREE-SPIN SCROLLING MODE
featureSections.description: For smooth, high-speed scrolling perfect for covering content quickly or emulating repeated game commands.

featureSections.title: SMART-REEL MODE
featureSections.description: Enable Smart-Reel mode to auto-switch from tactile to free-spin scrolling based on your scroll speed.

featureBannerImage.title: 12-ZONE CHROMA LIGHTING WITH FULL UNDERGLOW
featureBannerImage.subtitle: Customize each zone from over 16.8 million colors and countless lighting effects, and experience greater immersion as they react dynamically with hundreds of Chroma-integrated games.

name: Razer DeathAdder V4 Pro
info: Wired esports mouse (63g) featuring the Razer Focus Pro 30K Optical Sensor and a refined ergonomic shape for high-performance grip.

featureBannerImage.title: RAZER HYPERSPEED WIRELESS GEN-2 Industry-leading Speed and Reliability.
featureBannerImage.subtitle: Feel the difference with an ultra-stable wireless system that’s over 63% more efficient*, and capable of true 8000 Hz polling rate with 37% lower latency than previous gen.

featureSections.title: 56 G* ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN
featureSections.description: e-engineered with weight optimizations and a smooth-touch finish, our latest DeathAdder gaming mouse is now more than 10% lighter than its predecessor.

featureSections.title: THE BIGGEST TECH LEAP IN A DECADE.
featureSections.description: Powered by a new generation of technologies, the DeathAdder V4 Pro represents the culmination of over two decades of engineering excellence—a bold leap that once again sets a new benchmark for what a gaming mouse can and should be.

featureSections.title: MADE WITH AND TRUSTED BY PROS
featureSections.description: Retaining an award-winning ergonomic shape loved by pros and fans alike, the mouse internals have been overhauled for greater structural integrity through sustainable materials.

featureSections.title: HEMISPHERICAL DONGLE REDESIGN Greater Connectivity and Stability.
featureSections.description: Designed to complement our fastest wireless technology, the larger dongle houses a longer antenna for greater signal strength, while a weighted base keeps it anchored to your desk. Check the status of your mouse at a glance with a set of convenient LED indicators.

galleryBanners.title: RAZER™ OPTICAL SCROLL WHEEL
galleryBanners.subtitle: 3.3x More Reliable Than Mechanical Designs.

galleryBanners.title: RAZER™ FOCUS PRO 45K OPTICAL SENSOR GEN-2
galleryBanners.subtitle: Aim true with an improved sensor with up to 45K DPI, 900 IPS, and 85 G. Supported by deep sensor customization options, enjoy flawless tracking on a variety of surfaces with 99.8% resolution accuracy.

galleryBanners.title: RAZER™ OPTICAL MOUSE SWITCHES GEN-4
galleryBanners.subtitle: Top-Tier Durability, Tactility, and Speed.

name: Razer Cobra Pro
info: Symmetrical, lightweight wireless mouse (77g) with 10 customizable controls, Focus Pro 30K Optical Sensor, and Razer Chroma RGB lighting.

featureBannerImage.title: RAZER HYPERSPEED WIRELESS GEN-2 Industry-leading Speed and Reliability.
featureBannerImage.subtitle: Feel the difference with an ultra-stable wireless system that’s over 63% more efficient*, and capable of true 8000 Hz polling rate with 37% lower latency than previous gen.

featureSections.title: PERFECTED FOR PLAY
featureSections.description: Cut the competition down to size and dazzle them all with the Razer Cobra Pro—a wireless gaming mouse powered by Razer Chroma RGB. Featuring Razer HyperSpeed Wireless and 11 individually programmable lighting zones, color your play with an illuminating level of freedom and immersion.

featureSections.title: 10 Customizable Controls For Advanced Macros Across 5 Onboard Profiles
featureSections.description: From essential commands to complex macros, enjoy a greater degree of control at your fingertips and be ready to game anywhere with 5 onboard memory profiles.

featureSections.title: 11-Zone Chroma Lighting with Full Underglow
featureSections.description: Whether it’s enhancing your immersion through Chroma-integrated games, or designing your dream gaming room setup, we offer a level of RGB lighting customization that can’t be found anywhere else.

featureSections.title: Compact Form Factor & Feature Packed For Easy Handling Across Multiple Grip Styles
featureSections.description: Weighing just 77 g, the Razer Cobra Pro’s small, lightweight design feels great to hold and ensures a seamlessly immersive gaming experience for claw, palm, and fingertip grip styles.

galleryBanners.title: RAZER HYPERFLUX V2 WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM
galleryBanners.subtitle: Includes charging mouse mat with dedicated puck

galleryBanners.title: RAZER MOUSE DOCK PRO
galleryBanners.subtitle: Includes Razer Wireless Charging Puck

galleryBanners.title: RAZER WIRELESS CHARGING PUCK
galleryBanners.subtitle: Wireless charging compatible with Razer wireless chargers and select inductive chargers

name: Razer Kitsune
info: All-button optical arcade controller for PS5 and PC. Features ultra-responsive Razer Low-Profile Optical Switches and a slim, portable design.

featureBannerImage.title: RAZER KITSUNE OPTICAL + PRECISION! THE ULTRA COMBO!
featureBannerImage.subtitle: Embrace a new fighting game meta with the Razer Kitsune—an all-button optical arcade controller that surpasses traditional fight sticks. With a precise quad movement button layout and lightning-fast optical switches, eliminate input errors from your game with the perfect competitive fighting companion for PS5™ and PC.

featureSections.title: PRECISE QUAD MOVEMENT BUTTON LAYOUT
featureSections.description: By replacing a joystick with 4 movement buttons, enjoy clean, crisp play without the input errors of typical fight sticks—from instantly buffering a charge to flawlessly performing complex motions.

featureSections.title: SLIM, PORTABLE FORM FACTOR
featureSections.description: The Razer Kitsune’s leverless design can be easily stored in your backpack, while its detachable USB Type C cable removes the need for constant coiling or uncoiling when packing or setting up.

featureSections.title: TOURNAMENT LOCK SWITCH
featureSections.description: a lock switch that disables non-essential buttons,

featureSections.title: CABLE SECURITY CLASP
featureSections.description: With a built-in lock to fasten the cable secure your win in the heat of competition by eliminating accidental inputs and disconnections.

featureSections.title: REMOVABLE ALUMINIUM TOP PLATE Fit Your Style
featureSections.description: From stunning Razer Customs vinyl wraps to creating your own via our downloadable template, simply unscrew the top plate and apply your desired design.

galleryBanners.title: POWERED BY RAZER CHROMA™ RGB
galleryBanners.subtitle: Includes charging mouse mat with dedicated puck

galleryBanners.title: ALSO AVAILABLE ON RAZER CUSTOMS
galleryBanners.subtitle: Street Fighter 6 Custom Mice > Street Fighter 6 Custom Mouse Mats >

name: Razer Kishi V3 Pro XL
info: Full-sized mobile gaming controller with Sensa HD Haptics, TMR Thumbsticks, and full-sized ergonomics for Android, iPhone 15/16, and iPad mini.

featureBannerImage.title: RAZER KITSUNE OPTICAL + PRECISION! THE ULTRA COMBO!
featureBannerImage.subtitle: Embrace a new fighting game meta with the Razer Kitsune—an all-button optical arcade controller that surpasses traditional fight sticks. With a precise quad movement button layout and lightning-fast optical switches, eliminate input errors from your game with the perfect competitive fighting companion for PS5™ and PC.

featureSections.title: FULL-SIZED CONTROLLER FORM FACTOR
featureSections.description: Console performance meets mobile convenience. Play for extended periods in complete comfort and control with larger ergonomic handles that feel more natural to hold than standard mobile controllers.

featureSections.title: FITS IPADS & ANDROID TABLETS UP TO 13”
featureSections.description: Experience larger than life mobile gaming. Get a viewing experience worthy of the best AAA games with an innovative telescopic bridge that fits iPads and Android tablets up to 13”.

featureSections.title: FULL-SIZED TMR THUMBSTICKS WITH SWAPPABLE CAPS
featureSections.description: Perfect your aim with high-precision, anti-drift thumbsticks that are superior to Hall Effect designs. Customize your mobile controller for more speed or precision with 2 swappable caps.

featureSections.title: DUAL MOUSE CLICK BACK BUTTONS & CLAW GRIP BUMPERS
featureSections.description: Enjoy the same ultra-responsive actuation found in our top gaming mice with 2 back buttons built into the controller’s ergonomic handles—topped with 2 claw grip bumpers for even more control.

featureSections.title: Discover Thousands of Games Across iOS and Android
featureSections.description: Launch games, customize controls, record and share gameplay, and keep your game controller updated with a free* app that can be brought up at the touch of a dedicated button.

galleryBanners.title: SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY AND CONVENIENCE
galleryBanners.subtitle: Enjoy low-latency gaming and smooth audio with plug-and-play convenience. Power your device as you game with passthrough charging.

galleryBanners.title: WIRED & REMOTE PLAY FOR PC
galleryBanners.subtitle: Turn it into a haptic PC controller via a direct low-latency USB C connection (cable sold separately). Remote play your PC games from any launcher with Razer Nexus and enjoy AAA gaming anywhere.

name: Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro
info: Full-size Mechanical keyboard with Command Dial, 8 dedicated macro keys, and immersive Chroma underglow. Up to 8000 Hz polling rate.

featureSections.title: RAZER™ COMMAND DIAL AND 8 DEDICATED MACRO KEYS
featureSections.description: Assume greater control over your battlestation by assigning a custom function to the keyboard’s programmable dial. Game with greater command using a set of macro keys for essential keybinds.

featureSections.title: RAZER™ COMMAND DIAL”
featureSections.description: Press the dial to toggle between each mode or hold SHIFT while pressing to return to the previous one. Easily identify which mode the dial is currently on with mode-specific backlight.”.

featureSections.title: RAZER™ MECHANICAL SWITCHES
featureSections.description: Choose between three switches that offer their own distinct feel. Go for the Green Switch for clicky, tactile feedback, the Orange Switch for quiet, tactile keystrokes, or the Yellow Switch for smooth, silent actuation

featureSections.title: MAGNETIC PLUSH LEATHERETTE WRIST REST WITH UNDERGLOW
featureSections.description: Designed to provide secure support for long hours of play, the soft, cushioned wrist rest also features Razer Chroma™ RGB—which perfectly lines up with the keyboard’s underglow.

galleryBanners.title: DOUBLESHOT ABS KEYCAPS
galleryBanners.subtitle: Using a doubleshot molding process to ensure the labelling never wears off, the keycaps also have extra-thick walls which make them extremely tough to withstand intense gaming.

galleryBanners.title: MULTI-FUNCTION ROLLER AND 4 MEDIA KEYS
galleryBanners.subtitle: Pause, play, skip and tweak everything from brightness to volume—the ultimate convenience as you enjoy your entertainment.

name: Razer BlackWidow V4 Pro 75%
info: Full-size Mechanical keyboard with Command Dial, 8 dedicated macro keys, and immersive Chroma underglow. Up to 8000 Hz polling rate. ,75%

featureSections.title: TRUE 4K HZ WIRELESS & BLUETOOTH 5.1
featureSections.description: Unlock a greater level of gaming response powered by Razer™ HyperSpeed and Razer™ HyperPolling technology. Gamers will be able to experience true 4000 Hz polling rate wirelessly on a gaming keyboard. Expand your control by connecting and toggling between 3 Bluetooth devices.

featureSections.title: HOT-SWAPPABLE DESIGN”
featureSections.description: Compatible with 3 or 5-pin switches, the keyboard’s socketed PCB allows you to easily swap out its pre-loaded switches for custom ones to achieve your desired key feel.

featureSections.title: OLED DISPLAY WITH RAZER™ COMMAND DIAL
featureSections.description: From checking your PC system metrics at a glance to customizing the display to show custom GIFs, expand your control with up to 100 customizable modes on the Razer Command Dial.

featureSections.title: RAZER COMMAND DIAL MODES
featureSections.description: Designed to provide secure support for long hours of play, the soft, cushioned wrist rest also features Razer Chroma™ RGB—which perfectly lines up with the keyboard’s underglow.

galleryBanners.title: OPTIMIZED TYPING EXPERIENCE
galleryBanners.subtitle: Enthusiast-Grade Typing Acoustics

galleryBanners.title: Gasket-mounted White FR4 Plate
galleryBanners.subtitle: FR4 consists of woven fiberglass for a balance of rigidity and flexibility. Its white color was specifically chosen to further improve RGB illumination.

galleryBanners.title: Plate Foam
galleryBanners.subtitle: The addition of foam between the plate and PCB helps remove unwanted resonance, achieving a cleaner sound profile.

galleryBanners.title: Tape-enhanced PCB with Hot-swap Sockets
galleryBanners.subtitle: A fire-retardant tape helps absorb higher frequencies while boosting mid and low frequencies for a fuller, richer sound profile.

galleryBanners.title: UP TO 2100 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE With Power Saving Mode
galleryBanners.subtitle: Eliminate keyboard downtime with a power-efficient design that truly goes the distance. Max out your gaming sessions by toggling Power Saving Mode (Fn + Esc), or enjoy wired use while charging with an included Type C cable.

name: Razer BlackShark V3 Pro
info: Wireless Esports headset with Hybrid ANC, Razer TriForce Titanium 50mm Drivers, HyperClear Mic, and HyperSpeed Wireless/Bluetooth connectivity.

featureSections.title: RAZER™ HYPERSPEED WIRELESS GEN-2
featureSections.description: Outpace all competition with the fastest wireless technology optimized for ultra-low latency as low as 10 ms, delivering near-instantaneous audio. Perfect for clutch plays and split-second decisions.

featureSections.title: DETACHABLE RAZER™ HYPERCLEAR FULL BAND 12 MM MIC”
featureSections.description: Armed with a large 12 mm capsule, this next-gen full band mic captures every detail of your shotcalls clearly and effectively suppresses background noise with a unidirectional pick-up pattern.

featureSections.title: HYBRID ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION Extreme Focus with Zero Distractions
featureSections.description: Stay in the zone and block out all distractions with advanced hybrid ANC on this esports gaming headset, backed by swiveling earcups and hybrid memory foam ear cushions that form a perfect seal for superior sound isolation. Customize your experience with 4 noise-canceling levels, adjustable via Razer Synapse or the Razer Audio app.

featureSections.title: RAZER™ TRIFORCE BIO-CELLULOSE 50 MM DRIVERS GEN-2
featureSections.description: Tuned for improved clarity and positional performance, the Gen-2 drivers feature a unique bio-cellulose diaphragm to deliver natural, powerful sound—hear every footstep with absolute precision.

featureSections.title: THX SPATIAL AUDIO
featureSections.description: Achieve ultimate competitive awareness through an expanded soundstage. Activate 7.1.4 surround sound* and enjoy precise overhead audio with an upgraded engine powered by the latest spatial algorithms.

galleryBanners.title: RAZER™ DUAL-LAYERED FLOWKNIT MEMORY FOAM CUSHIONS
galleryBanners.subtitle: Get the best of both worlds with the strong sound isolation of leatherette, layered with breathable, moisture-wicking fabric for long-lasting gaming comfort.

galleryBanners.title: ADAPTIVE 15° SWIVEL JOINTS
galleryBanners.subtitle: Enjoy a snug fit and optimal seal with earcups that conform to the angle of your ears.

galleryBanners.title: Plate Foam
galleryBanners.subtitle: The addition of foam between the plate and PCB helps remove unwanted resonance, achieving a cleaner sound profile.

galleryBanners.title: FLEXIBLE, DURABLE BUILD
galleryBanners.subtitle: From the leatherette headband to swivel holders, the headset’s reinforced build is made to withstand and stay secure against any knocks and bumps when things heat up.

galleryBanners.title: 70 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE WITH TYPE C CHARGING
galleryBanners.subtitle: Get 6 hours of play with just 15 minutes of charging

name: Razer Kraken V4 Pro
info: Wireless gaming headset with Razer HyperSense Haptic Feedback (Vibration), THX Spatial Audio, and TriForce Titanium 50mm Drivers.

featureSections.title: OLED CONTROL HUB Full Customizability and Multi-Platform Connectivity
featureSections.description: Centralize the control of your battlestation with one powerful device featuring over 20 customization options. Personalize your experience by adjusting audio, haptics, power-saving, and home screen settings easily via an ergonomically angled interface.

featureSections.title: 4 MODES OF CONNECTIVITY”
featureSections.description: Whether you’re on PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, or on your mobile device, enjoy full audio immersion no matter the scenario with Razer’s first gaming headset to offer 4 modes of connectivity. Go wireless with ultra-fast 2.4 GHz, Bluetooth connectivity, or stay plugged in for non-stop gaming via USB. Connect up to 3 systems or devices at the same time to the OLED Control Hub and switch between audio sources with seamless convenience.

featureSections.title: FLUSHED RETRACTABLE DESIGN
featureSections.description: Simply pull out the mic and be ready to go. Get it into the perfect position thanks to a flexible gooseneck wire, and easily tuck it back into the earcup when not in use. Additionally, easily view your mic status with a conveniently-located mic mute indicator.

featureSections.title: RAZER™ TRIFORCE BIO-CELLULOSE 40 MM DRIVERS
featureSections.description: Our upgraded Razer TriForce Driver design utilizes an ultra-thin bio-cellulose diaphragm, improving the soundstage and reducing distortion for distinct clarity and deep bass reproduction. Enjoy the rich environmental sounds of your in-game world with clear distinction between voices and audio cues.

featureSections.title: 9-ZONE EARCUP LIGHTING
featureSections.description: Enjoy new, stunning lighting effects made possible with 9-zone earcup lighting. With access to 16.8 million colors and a suite of lighting effects, apply your preferred settings and watch it work seamlessly with over 300 games and 500 devices across more than 50 partners.

featureSections.title: CUSTOMIZE INDIVIDUAL LIGHTING ZONES IN CHROMA STUDIO
featureSections.description: Personalize and unlock additional Chroma effects

galleryBanners.title: SIMULTANEOUS 2.4GHz & BLUETOOTH AUDIO
galleryBanners.subtitle: Listen in to two audio connections simultaneously when using Razer HyperSpeed wireless alongside a Bluetooth device. Stay on comms with your squad at all times via Discord on mobile whilst playing your favorite games on PC/Console.

galleryBanners.title: FEEL IT FOR YOURSELF AT RAZERSTORE
galleryBanners.subtitle: Visit your nearest RazerStore and test out our latest gear powered by Razer Sensa HD Haptics. Have your mind blown by the most realistic and complex tactile sensations at the Sensa Experience Zone.

galleryBanners.title: THX SPATIAL AUDIO
galleryBanners.subtitle: Bring your games to life with a fully immersive 3D audio experience powered by advanced spatial algorithms. Get a true sense of audio depth and positioning that places you in the middle of all the action.

galleryBanners.title: LASTING DURABILITY. ALL-DAY COMFORT.
galleryBanners.subtitle: From the leatherette headband to swivel holders, the headset’s reinforced build is made to withstand and stay secure against any knocks and bumps when things heat up.

name: Samsung Odyssey G95SC OLED 49"
info: 49-inch Curved OLED DQHD (5120x1440) monitor with 240Hz refresh rate and 0.03ms response time. Immersive 1800R curve with Smart TV features.

featureBannerImage.title: A new era of OLED gaming

featureSections.title: Lose yourself in super ultrawide vistas
featureSections.description: Immense worlds envelop you through a super ultrawide display. A screen as wide as two quad high definition monitors delivers maximum space to take in all the pin-sharp detail. It wraps around your field of vision with 1800R curvature to put you fully into your characters shoes.

featureSections.title: Sharper visuals with densely packed pixels”
featureSections.description: Dont sacrifice detail, even with a larger screen. More pixels per inch gives you the level of clarity you need to pick up on the small, but significant, details across the 1.244 m Odyssey OLED G9 screen.

featureSections.title: See into the shadows with purer black levels
0.03ms Response time(GtG) & 240 Hz Refresh rate
featureSections.description: Outmaneuver opponents with supreme speed

name: Beluga V2 Gaming Headphones
info: Experience immersive audio with 53mm Graphene Drivers and Dual Chamber Technology for precise sound. Built for comfort during long sessions with a lightweight aluminum frame and a convenient flip-to-mute microphone.

name: Cirrus Ergonomic Chair
info: A race-car inspired design with ElastoFlex tech where split back wings flex to hug your spine. Features a FreeArch recline system and breathable fabric for ultimate comfort.

featureBannerImage.title: Cirrus Ergonomic Chair
featureBannerImage.subtitle: A race-car inspired design with ElastoFlex tech where split back wings flex to hug your spine. Features a FreeArch recline system and breathable fabric for ultimate comfort.

featureSections.title: Race Car Inspired Design
featureSections.description: Unleash your inner champion with our race car-inspired design. Born from the track, built for warriors. This isnt just a chair—its your cockpit for conquering every challenge. Aggressive styling meets uncompromising performance, giving you the edge you need to dominate your day.

featureSections.title: BIFMA Certified Class 4 Gas Lift
featureSections.description: With a BIFMA Certified Class 4 Gas Lift, the Noctus is rated for 150Kgs

featureSections.title: 135° Recline Support
featureSections.description: Discover the perfect balance between work and relaxation with our 135-degree recline mechanism. Engineered for optimal comfort, the precisely calibrated angle promotes healthy blood circulation while reducing pressure on your spine, making it ideal for extended sitting sessions.

name: Swarm X All Black Wireless Keyboard
info: The clean all-white version of the Swarm X. A 75% wireless keyboard with a metal volume knob, 270+ hours of battery life, and 4-layer sound dampening.

featureSections.title: 4 Layer Sound Absorption
featureSections.description: Designed for peak performance, Kreo's 4-layer sound absorption system enhances your typing experience by significantly reducing noise and vibrations. Each layer is meticulously engineered to deliver a smoother, quieter, and more satisfying keystroke—perfect for long gaming sessions and focused work environments.

featureSections.title: Metal Volume Knob
featureSections.description: A sleek, integrated metal knob provides precise control over your volume, combining functionality with a premium feel.

featureSections.title: Completely Hotswappable

featureSections.title: Seamless Tri-Mode Switching
featureSections.description: Stay connected your way—wired, wireless, or Bluetooth.

featureSections.description: Swarm is designed for an ultra-smooth and satisfying typing experience. By incorporating a flexible gasket between the plate and case, this innovative design effectively dampens vibrations and softens keystrokes, ensuring a quiet and comfortable feel.

featureSections.title: Elevated Stand
featureSections.description: Every component of the Swarm keyboard is engineered for flawless performance. From the durable PBT keycaps to the precise PCB layout, expect a consistent and reliable typing experience.

name: Ikarus White 55g Wireless Gaming Mouse
info: Our flagship 55g wireless gaming mouse with a Pixart 3395 sensor, 4000Hz polling rate, and Motion Sync Technology for ultimate precision.

featureSections.title: 100+ Hours
featureSections.description: Battery life for unmatched freedom.

featureSections.title: PixArt Motion Sync Technology
featureSections.description: This latest flagship sensor from Pixart has the highest specs in the market with extreme precision of 99.6% resolution accuracy. However, this does not mean the sensor is more accurate tracking. To make your sensor more accurate tracking, the Motion-Sync Technology is built into the sensor. Your PC extracts information from another sensor at a rate that does not perfectly match the signal the mouse sends out when it extracts information from another sensor. The Motion-Sync Technology synchronize its signals intelligently at the exact intervals your pc extracts information. This allows the tracking to be very accurate. However, this may cause some motion-delay (less than 1ms) that is not noticeable during in-game play

featureSections.title: Ultralight-55g
featureSections.description: For those super quick flick shots

featureSections.title: 100% PTFE Feet
featureSections.description: Glide smoothly across surfaces

name: Razer Iskur V2
info: The ultimate gaming chair for hardcore gaming with adaptive lumbar support.

featureSections.title: WORLD’S FIRST 6D ADAPTIVE & ADJUSTABLE LUMBAR SUPPORT
featureSections.description: Enjoy full-range back support with our proprietary system, featuring a 360° swivel design that adjusts up, down, in, and out.

featureSections.title: DUAL-DENSITY, COLD-CURED FOAM SEAT CUSHION
featureSections.description: Experience the perfect balance of support and comfort with an optimized cushion that relieves pressure during prolonged sitting.

featureSections.title: 4D ARMRESTS
featureSections.description: Highly resistant to peeling and cracking, line them up perfectly to how you sit by adjusting their height, position, and angle.

featureSections.title: REACTIVE SEAT TILT & UP TO 152° RECLINE
featureSections.description: Lean back and enjoy seamless support for a variety of positions with a fully adjustable backrest that instantly adapts to your weight.

name: Razer Kiyo V2
info: Stream in stunning 4K with Phase Detection Autofocus (PDAF), dual stereo mics, and a wide 77° field of view. Includes a magnetic privacy cover.

name: Razer Laptop Cooling Pad
info: Stay cool when things heat up with the Razer Laptop Cooling Pad – a smart stand that dynamically controls fan speeds based on your laptop’s temperature. Features full-spectrum color temperature control (3200K-6500K) and a heavy-duty 6.6 ft tripod.

info: Experience personalized back comfort with our innovative 3-point adjustable lumbar support system and a 135-degree recline. Engineered for optimal comfort, the Actus V2 is ideal for both focused productivity and relaxation.

featureSections.title: 2D Adjustable Headrest

featureSections.title: 3-Point Adjustable Lumbar Support
featureSections.description: Experience personalized back comfort with our innovative 3-point adjustable lumbar support system. Featuring independent pillows for precision adjustments to your spine's natural curve. Whether you're working at your desk or relaxing at home, find your perfect balance of support and comfort for all-day relief.

featureSections.title: 135° Recline Support
featureSections.description: Discover the perfect balance between work and relaxation with our 135-degree recline mechanism. Engineered for optimal comfort, the precisely calibrated angle promotes healthy blood circulation while reducing pressure on your spine, making it ideal for extended sitting sessions.

name: SurgeX8 Wireless PC Gaming Controller
info: Unleash precision gaming with the SurgeX8 controller, featuring Hall Effect joysticks and triggers to eliminate stick drift and ensure flawless response. Connect via Bluetooth, 2.4GHz dongle, or wired Type-C.

featureSections.title: High Precision Joystick
featureSections.description: More accurate, smoother PC + PTE material effectively addresses friction induces wear and tear, ensuring joystick longevity and stick drift.

name: Ikarus Black 55g Wireless Gaming Mouse
info: Our flagship 55g wireless gaming mouse in black, featuring a Pixart 3395 sensor, 4000Hz polling rate, and Motion Sync Technology.

featureSections.title: 100+ Hours
featureSections.description: Battery life for unmatched freedom.

featureSections.title: PixArt Motion Sync Technology
featureSections.description: This latest flagship sensor from Pixart has the highest specs in the market with extreme precision of 99.6% resolution accuracy. However, this does not mean the sensor is more accurate tracking. To make your sensor more accurate tracking, the Motion-Sync Technology is built into the sensor. Your PC extracts information from another sensor at a rate that does not perfectly match the signal the mouse sends out when it extracts information from another sensor. The Motion-Sync Technology synchronize its signals intelligently at the exact intervals your pc extracts information. This allows the tracking to be very accurate. However, this may cause some motion-delay (less than 1ms) that is not noticeable during in-game play
